Não existe um único jogo em nosso site c: There is not a single game on our site with a 100% chance of winning. Even 99.9% is a 1 in 1,000 chance of you losing. For example, in the Ladders game, when you throw at a rock, there is a 1 in 20 (5%) chance that you will lose. Therefore, when playing on our website you can win or lose. We do not interfere in the gameplay in any way, so it all depends on your luck. We cannot in any way replace the result of your game, therefore on your part there is a line called the Client hash. Initially, the Client hash is generated automatically, but you can always change it and specify any characters in it. To check the result of your games, click on any of your games from the history and in the window that appears below you will see the Server hash field. To check the game result - you need to go to the Fair game page, enter the server hash - and you will see the game result. We advise you to play more carefully. Develop your own betting styles and play accordingly. Don't flirt, know how to stop right away and withdraw money. The game is designed to entertain. Remember that you are risking money when betting. Don't spend more than you can afford to lose.
